Description.Text:
Somerset Orchard offers spacious and comfortable apartments located just off Orchard Road. The Somerset MRT (Mass Rapid Transit) is only a few minutes walk, giving you access to the Central Business District and many destinations in Singapore. The convenient location makes the residence ideal corporate and interim housing for the expatriate and family. Stroll at your leisure to the abundant and varied restaurants and shops in the main shopping district. Whether for business travel, holiday, project assignment or relocation, you can enjoy city living in the security and comfort of a private apartment. The hotel offers Airport transfer, Baby sitting service, Barbecue area, Children's facilities, Dry cleaning, Gym / Fitness facilities, Laundry service, Lift / Elevator, Lobby, Non-smoking rooms, Parking facilities - at cost, Reception, Swimming pool - outdoor, Residence Lounge, and Business Centre Services.
Rates are inclusive of basic wireless internet access and daily continental breakfast. Daily housekeeping (three times a week change of linen and towels) except on Sundays and Public Holidays.
*Minimum stay of 7 nights is required.

Situated just off Orchard Road in Singapore, the serviced residence is both peaceful and convenient. The Somerset MRT station is a few minutes walk and gives you immediate access to the Central Business District and most destinations in Singapore. Directly surrounding the building is a myriad of shops and restaurants to explore and enjoy.

Studio Executive - This room offers one queen bed with Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, CD player, Color TV, Crockery / Cutlery, DVD player, Ensuite / Private bathroom, Hairdryer, Iron / Ironing board, Kettle, Full Kitchen, Modem / data port connection, Non-smoking rooms, Refrigerator, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone, Toaster and Voicemail.
Two Bedroom Deluxe - This room offers one queen bed and one single bed with Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, CD player, Color TV, Crockery / Cutlery, DVD player, Ensuite / Private bathroom, Hairdryer, Iron / Ironing board, Kettle, Full Kitchen, Modem / data port connection, Non-smoking rooms, Refrigerator, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone, Toaster and Voicemail.
